poem:
Title: "In Trust of the Technocrat"

From unseen depths, a wunderkind ascends,
Whiplash-thin whisper, clad in silicone trends.
With infant eyes bright, Sam takes the helm,
A mammon craving, that would overwhelm.
A digital Titan, clad in binary code,
In seven trillion dreams, his kingdom strode.
Yet let's pray caution tames his ambitious knits,
For technology, unchecked, in us breeds pits.
